mapper.insert: insert into jumei.jm_bt_sku_import ( channel_id, product_code, sku, upc_code, abroad_price, deal_price, market_price, size, created, creater, modified, modifier) values ( #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abroadPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dealPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
